channel.title: romance on BeaconStreet USA
channel.description: Recent content in romance on BeaconStreet USA

item.title: INFJ meets ISFJ
item.description: INFJs and ISFJs are alike in many ways. They’re introverted, feeling, and judging. They differ only on the intuitive/sensing dimension of the Myers-Briggs Inventory.

item.title: INFJ Men as Lovers
item.description: INFJ men are complex, warm, and perceptive. They’re drawn to women who are intelligent, creative, and compassionate. While few INFJ men ever achieve perfect relationships, they always wish for them.

item.title: It’s Hard To Be an INFJ: The Author’s Personal Story
item.description: Since posting “It’s Hard To Be an INFJ” on this blog, I’ve received hundreds of e-mails from other INFJs. Their main theme has been how disconnected they’ve felt surrounded by extraverts and more sensible, earthbound types.
